column5: Here's a little , retaliation to Silvio and BBNotty's post from yesterday !!!  I had a few hours this morning, and I new the rain would have helped bring in a good run of fish. Figured I would get out today as the rain we are expecting tonight/tomorrow is gonna blow out most of the rivers for the weekend. Water was the perfect greeeeen.... prob about 20" visability, which made for perfect conditions...Picked the wrong river at first light but got to the right one by about 10AM....We fished for 2 hours with not stop action, one after another !!! .                                                                                                                                               The poor roe bag slingers were throwing bags out all morning and we walked in the pool at 10AM with the artificials and cleaned up... In the last few weeks I have gained some new found confidence in flies, jigs, and plastics. The take downs are so much more fierce and aggressive..What a rush when the float just drops  10" in the blink of an eye !!!  Here's a few of the fish we got into  First drift my buddy smacked this fat hen....   I follwed up  on my second drift with this football   4th drift Steve hits this freshy      Sorry, had to distort the fly... Silvio has me sworn to secrecy on it !!!      A little west coast pose   You wouldn't believe it , but I caught this fish again about 3 drifts later on the same single egg pattern...   Even the blue heron was catching fish !!!... I couldn't believe he swallowed this 1lb steelie     And the icing on the cake, was this mid teens male Buck !!....Took Steve a good 15min to finally get him in... What a battle... Amazing watching his IMX turn this fish in and out of every snag it could find.    The stretch makes it look 20lbs, LOL   The release
I feel like I'm on a bad acid trip!  Man, you guys hit them hard, great report!
You werent kidding when you said  you slammed them today!  Wicked fishin bro
Why do I have to work today ..
Fishing chrome in the "twilight zone". Nice fish, WTG!!
Great stuff guys!  Seems the east was on everywhere...you didn't see us because I don't think we were on the same trib...
Good looking fish JDMLS and a fine looking rod between you legs
Dave told you pm me was it trib 1 or 2 ? Good job bro tell steve that fish is hugeeeeee nice pics.
SICK report. Thanks for making the office that much less boring
I think we were a little more east of you guys today... I recognize that mud Cliff, LOL !!
Wheres the BUCK? LOL  Nice report and fish.
great job boys..i hope you guys saved some for me..  that trib is so HOT lately..
Great report and pics JDMLS  Simply awesome    Congratulation Thanks for sharing Leechman
This is part 4 to stainless steelheading.
Keep them parts coming.... Really enjoy seeing you guys catching such magnificient fish Leechman
wow those are very nice looking fish. Congrads on all the great catches
im pretty jealous
Wow, you guys had a great morning out there. good job Dave, see ya soon.  Berge
nice chromers.. looks like the camera was on acid though
Awesome report. Good job spanking all that chrome .  Thanks for blurring the background, too  Good luck this weekend, as well!  p.-
another great day on another great trib!!! good fishin JDMLS!!!    Hawk
Great fish ! Looks like an amazing day on the river.
